TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Chuao Fields[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's wealth with an additional commerce bonus. They also increase the city's happiness with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fur[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ivory[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Silk[COLOR_REVERT], or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Whales[COLOR_REVERT].

They also increase the city's happiness with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fur[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ivory[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Silk[COLOR_REVERT], or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Whales[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [TAB]Remote and inaccessible, Chuao is a village in modern-day Venezuela. It is renowned for producing some of the finest cocoa beans in the world. These beans, of the criollo variety, have become increasingly rare due to disease and interbreeding with other species of cocoa. The town itself is largely given over to production of the highly-sought after bean; the central square and many public spaces are used for drying and fermenting the cocoa.
